discussion.author: bradlo
discussion.text: We use the acronym RAI to brand all of our developer materials, including all language SDKs. Our users appreciate the consistency and we think it is more "developer friendly" than using the relatively long company name, RelationalAI.

discussion.author: NHDaly
discussion.text:
üëç Will also add that we see this as similar to the following examples of SDKs for cloud services:
- AWS.jl
- GCP.jl
etc
